front.title: Recommendations for Creating IANA-Maintained YANG Modules

abstract.t: This document provides a set of guidelines for YANG module authors related to the design of IANA-maintained modules. These guidelines are meant to leverage existing IANA registries and use YANG as just another format to present the content of these registries. This document updates RFC 8407 by providing additional guidelines for IANA-maintained modules. It also relaxes a recommendation related to the extensibility for such modules.
